File List

Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
src/serial/ll-src/common.f [code]Modules that contain common variables
src/serial/ll-src/finaldump.f [code]Save relevant data at the end of the simulation run to file 'final.out'
src/serial/ll-src/hydrodynamics.f [code]Calculate velocity, pressure and chemical potential using fbar and gbar
src/serial/ll-src/init.f [code]Initialize all variables and arrays and save initialized data to file
src/serial/ll-src/main.f [code]Driver for the D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM
src/serial/ll-src/memalloc.f [code]Allocate (FLAG == 1) or deallocate (FLAG != 1) memory for common arrays
src/serial/ll-src/parameters.f [code]Read input parameters and define simulation constants
src/serial/ll-src/poststream.f [code]Post-Stream step for distribution functions f and g
src/serial/ll-src/prestream.f [code]Pre-Stream and Stream steps for distribution functions f and g
src/serial/ll-src/stats.f [code]Calculate intermediate simulation results and save to file 'stats.out'
src/serial/ll-src/vtkplane.f [code]Save simulation data in VTK format
